text: Dangerous Moves () is a 1984 Swiss French Liechtenstein sports drama movie directed by Richard Dembo and starring Michel Piccoli, Alexandre Arbatt, Liv Ullmann, Leslie Caron, Wojciech Pszoniak, Daniel Olbrychski, Michel Aumont. It won an Academy Award in 1985. ==Other websites== * Category:1980s sports movies Category:1984 drama movies Category:Swiss drama movies Category:French drama movies Category:Liechtenstein movies
title: Dangerous Moves
